description: HE1 archives are used by classic adventure games, such as Putt-Putt, Pajama Sam, Fatty Bear, and Freddi Fish, developed by Humongous Entertainment. The HE1 archive is also used by ScummVM, a virtual machine that lets you play the previously mentioned games, as long as you have the appropriate game resource files.
NOTE: The HE1 resource archive is located in the game directory.
